resources.string: Keep track of all the people on your team, set your roster and stay connected. You can import from your phone contacts or from an existing TeamSnap team.

Hi, my name is Dane! Welcome to my demo! I noticed a white screen on startup, so I introduced a window background. androidx.core.splashscreen will hopefully make this easier, but an older way was used for now!

The bottom navigation frees us to use the tabs as a sort of filter, replacing the older menu style. There may be more modern/clever ways of representing a filter.\n\nPress the fab to see the re-skinned creation view.
I noticed the icons in the settings were not quite centered with the center of the text, however I got busy, no demo here, sorry :(
